contents.item: You can become great through the power of time
Discovering yourself is the major key to being successful
Your calling is concealed in you and has to be discovered by you alone
Until you fight the battle against time, you won’t know how best to manage your time
Life was given to be lived for God and people
No amount of money can recover lost time
The first thing to do after you get fired is to discover God
Time is the raw material for creation
Love is about sharing
You have to be skillful in your time management to be productive
A busy life is not necessarily an effective life
When you invest in life, you are being fruitful and productive
Your intensity increases your net worth
Work is created to be an instrument through which you release your potential
Investing time in adding value to yourself is the best way to invest time
To work (at a job) is to sacrifice the life you have at the moment
Celebrate God daily by celebrating His creation
You need to discover how to invest your life
The vicious circle of life is employment
You cannot find God without finding people
Always have a list of what you want to achieve in life
The way we relate with people is the same way we relate with God
Find time to meditate and see how you can improve your life and achieve your goals
It’ll never be too late to start to make use of the time you still have left
Walk and learn from the people that inspire you to do great things
Life should be used to fulfill the purposes of the Kingdom
After losing you job, you have to sit, relax and discover yourself
The secret of effective living is detachment
The image of God is in every human
Always be the light. Do not wait for others to take responsibility
The concept of work should be understood diligently
Always ask yourself if you are really serving God
Life is about fruitfulness
We were created to purposefully live a life that glorifies God
Evaluate and assess your life on a daily
Your calling multiplies you
You have to discover the essence of your creation
You cannot discover God without discovering people
Production is the greatest assessment of time well spent
Time wasters are life wasters
Celebrating people is a form of love
Life is given to bring the will of God on earth
We should be blessings to others as believers
Love others the way God loves you
Time is the chronological breakdown of life
Convert your knowledge into product
It is only when you trust in God that you can make it life
Always make positive use of every second and minute
You reproduce your life only when you work in the area of your calling
Poverty is the mother of invention
When” answers the question on time which is the currency of time
Losing your job gives you access to time
The goal is not to be delivered of your problem only but to be an instrument of God
Never see yourself as a disappointment or failure just because you were fired
You can never know who you really are or what you can do until you discover yourself
Don’t go in the opposite direction, locate your calling
Time used to do irrelevancies can be channeled into something productive instead
Your calling is your destiny
If you don’t pursue purpose, you won’t know what to with your time
Purposefully dedicating time into developing yourself is one of the keys to being effective in life
Joblessness is a rare privilege
A job shouldn’t be a mean of existence but rather, a means of sustenance
We cannot glorify God when we refuse to celebrate others
What you do with your time on a daily basis determines how far you will go in life
Getting fired from work paves way for a new beginning
Always see the positive aspect of every situation you find yourself
Don’t waste time on employment, discover yourself today
Always work and take productive actions
Your calling is in what you read, think and talk about
You are the center of your life
Don’t equate effective living to being busy
Our behavior to ordinary people depicts our actual nature
Time produces quality product
The next thing to do after discovering who you are is to build and add value to yourself
Joblessness gives you liberty
As you grow older, you become faced with the problem of what to with your time
The only way to make life fruitful is by being productive
Convert everything around you into meaningful products
Every minute, hour and hour that passes daily should be converted into product
Money is a compensation for time spent
Open your eyes to new opportunities
Living for your purpose warrants eternal blessings
Use time to convert yourself
Life is the subtotal of time
Every unit of time that passes daily should be accounted for
The desire to get money through jobs enslaves us
Until you believe in yourself, it does not matter how much you believe in God
To get an effective product, you need to find your calling
Make optimum use of every second that passes daily
Everything is a product of time because it took a particular period of time to achieve that result
